doc.title: pilgrIMAGE
doc.plot: How does each of us watch movies and media? And how does that change from generation to generation? In a humorous, eye-opening documentary that spans the globe, the filmmaking father-daughter duo visit cinematic landmarks, Fellini's hometown, Riefenstahl's Nuremburg, Lumi√®re's first factory, and encounter people with all types of film life lessons to impart.
